dataSets.caption: Actiontype
dataSets.name: action
dataSets.helpText: Select if you want to send mails or debug your mailtemplate. In debug-mode, mails are written into the template-folder.

dataSets.caption: Send mail for
dataSets.name: cases
dataSets.helpText: Select if a mail should be sent in case of an ERROR, OK or HINT-message.

dataSets.caption: Mailserver
dataSets.name: host
dataSets.helpText: The address of the smtp server which the bucket-collector will use to send mails.

dataSets.caption: Mailserver Username
dataSets.name: user
dataSets.helpText: The user of the smtp server which the bucket-collector will use to send mails. (Leave empty if none is required)

dataSets.caption: Mailserver Password
dataSets.name: pass
dataSets.helpText: The password of the user given above. (Leave empty if none is required)

dataSets.caption: Sender
dataSets.name: from
dataSets.helpText: The address which is set as the sender.

dataSets.caption: Recipient addresses
dataSets.name: to
dataSets.helpText: The addresses which are set as the recipient. If none are given the address of the bucketowner is used.

dataSets.caption: BCC addresses
dataSets.name: bcc
dataSets.helpText: The addresses which are set as the recipient. If none are given the address of the bucketowner is used.
